segments.text: I see the woman drying a plate, completely focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress and apron make her look so domestic and composed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I notice the sink is overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water spills over the edge, pooling on the floor beneath her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she even knows what's happening at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so serene, a stark contrast to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of impending disaster when I look at the children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing that rickety stool, desperate for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can he be so careless?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him seems to be encouraging this risky behavior.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could intervene, but I'm just a silent witness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the tension building, as a fall seems inevitable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if the woman slips on the water and falls too?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of broken dishes and injuries makes my stomach churn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone notices before itâ€™s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
